name: ace
description: ACE (Agentic Context Engineering) - CLI-based pattern learning. Direct ce-ace CLI integration via hooks. No MCP server, no subagents. v5.1.13: Intelligent prompt-based Stop hook uses Haiku LLM for semantic evaluation. Captures 2-3x more learning (40-60% vs 10-20%). Requires ce-ace >= v1.0.13. Based on Stanford/SambaNova/UC Berkeley research
